actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain laminate wood floor molding, other than standard molding, less than 4-feet in length but greater than 3-feet in length.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain laminate wood floor molding, other than standard molding, less than 4-feet in length but greater than 3-feet in length.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain laminate wood floor molding, other than standard molding, less than 4-feet in length but greater than 3-feet in length.
